messages.subject: saying hi
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/22/03 2:43:30 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/22/03 2:43:30 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
I found this group yesterday while cruising around yahoo and joined
up and was excited to *see* so many names that I recognized from
unschooling-dotcom. >>

You found our little corner Rebecca!! We all jumped ship and followed Sandra
here during a particularly exasperating time at unschooling.com


Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett

messages.subject: saying hi
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, my name is Rebecca. Mom to 2 boys Jaiden(4) and Avery(19m). We live in San Diego. We are living, loving and learning together all the time now and I see no
messages.messageBody:
Hi, my name is Rebecca. Mom to 2 boys Jaiden(4) and Avery(19m). We
live in San Diego. We are living, loving and learning together all
the time now and I see no reason to change that just because my kids
turn 5 and everybody (family, friends,the state @@)thinks I should.

I found this group yesterday while cruising around yahoo and joined
up and was excited to *see* so many names that I recognized from
unschooling-dotcom. I'm gonna keep reading the archives for now, I
just wanted to say "hi".

Rebecca
